title: League Update and Loot
body: I updated league and my loot skins were missing how can i get them back?

replies.body: I've got your inventory pulled up now and I do see a few skin shards still there like Star Guardian Janna and Shadowfire Kindred. Are there others that you might be missing? Also keep in mind that after this latest patch, your chests and keys have been moved to the top so skins shards will be bumped down a little.
